nodes.description: Akram Khan Durrani遭遇炸弹袭击，造成2人死亡3人受伤
nodes.support_text: A bomb blast near the convoy of Federal Minister for Housing and Works Akram Khan Durrani in the Nermikhel area left two people dead and three injured.

nodes.description: 部长的车队一辆救护车受损，其本人幸免于难
nodes.support_text: an ambulance in the convoy was damaged.

nodes.description: 卫生部门员工Ihsan Khan当场死亡，另一名死者身份未确认
nodes.support_text: An employee of the health department, Ihsan Khan, died on the spot.

nodes.description: 伤者Mohammad Rauf、Shireen Khan和司机Abid被送医治疗
nodes.support_text: Mohammad Rauf, Shireen Khan and driver Abid were injured and taken to District Headquarters Hospital.

nodes.description: 爆炸系遥控引爆的简易爆炸装置造成
nodes.support_text: Police said the blast had been caused by an improvised explosive device on the road was detonated by remote control.

nodes.description: Durrani系JUI-F资深领导人，返家途中刚参加该党欢迎新成员集会
nodes.support_text: was going home after addressing a gathering organised to welcome workers of other parties joining the JUI-F.

nodes.description: 警方封锁现场并展开搜查，未发现嫌疑人
nodes.support_text: Personnel of the police other law-enforcement agencies cordoned off the area and carried out a search but no arrests were made.

nodes.description: 爆炸地点邻近北瓦济斯坦地区
nodes.support_text: The area where the explosion took place is adjacent to North Waziristan.

nodes.description: Durrani曾在2007年担任省首席部长时遭遇过暗杀未遂
nodes.support_text: He had survived an attempt on his life in 2007 when he was chief minister of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa.

nodes.description: 目前尚无任何组织宣称对袭击负责
nodes.support_text: No group has claimed responsibility for the attack.
Police said the blast had been caused by an improvised explosive device on the road was detonated by remote control.
was going home after addressing a gathering organised to welcome workers of other parties joining the JUI-F.

nodes.description: Akram Khan Durrani勉强逃脱炸弹袭击
nodes.support_text: Akram Khan Durrani勉强逃脱炸弹袭击

nodes.description: 某团体宣称对袭击负责
nodes.support_text: 某团体宣称对袭击负责

根据temporal_order 4 < 5，体现警方报告在部长讲话前发生
根据temporal_order 2 < 1，体现逃脱发生在炸弹袭击前
根据temporal_order 5 > 1，体现宣称发生在炸弹袭击后
